message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is just a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500? I'm confident this price will be fair for both of us.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I believe $10,500 is still a bit high for me. I would like to propose $10,200 as a compromise. This price reflects the value I see in the product while staying within my budget.
